text: RS was the musical name of Jay-Ronne Grootfaam. He was an important drill rapper from Amsterdam. Drill rap is a form of rap that celebrates violence. == Music == Grootfaam rapped about violence, crime and his life in Amsterdam. == Death == On September 3rd 2019, Grootfaam was killed with a knife. The killer was part of a rap group that Grootfaam was in conflict with. It was the first time in the Netherlands that someone died as a result of a drill rap conflict. == Sources == Category:2000 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Musicians from Amsterdam Category:People murdered in the Netherlands Category:Dutch murder victims
title: RS (rapper)
